name: StIR StrategyImpactReputation FZE
goal: StIR provides strategic advisory services, both to private and to public sector clients. StIR's client base is global, but with a special emphasis on the Middle East, CEE and Central Asia. Over the course of the last two years, StIR has increased its Africa related activities.
interests: Business and Industry, Communication, Economy, finance and the euro, European Neighbourhood Policy, Foreign affairs and security policy, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Regional Policy, Transport
euInitiatives: StIR touches on a variety of EU related topics in the wider context of its global client services, with a particular interest in topics related to economic development, good governance but also rule of law. However, at this stage, it does not follow any specific initiatives, policies and/or legislative files.
